name: Gizmo (itch) (Vicoodi)
description:
Join a small and resourceful robot on a journey to escape a crumbling factory with the help of other robots. Explore the factory's various rooms and solve challenging puzzles to reach safety. With a short and compact story, this puzzle-platformer is  is appropriat for a short calming setting Will the robot find a way to escape before it's too late? Play the game and find out!

this game is a submission to the Ramadan Development Nights  gamejam
